item.description:
This a package deal (transportation and Tickets) organized by the Photographer's FORUM camera club. You are welcome to join the trip and spend the day with a great group of people and fellow photographers. AVEDON is an icon of American photography and the exhibit of his images will inspire you.

HERE ARE THE DETAILS:


PHOTOGRAPHERS FORUM FIELD TRIP TO BOSTON-Museum of Fine Arts[/

color]

Richard Avedon - The most dynamic photographer of the mid-20th century. His images have become icons of photographic history


DATE: Sunday, Nov 7

We’re chartering a bus! The cost is $45/person which includes your admission to the museum and special Avedon exhibit, motorcoach transportation and driver’s gratuity. Deadline for reservations is Mon, Oct 18

Itinerary:
~8:40 a.m.—Depart Macy’s, 125 South River Road, Bedford, NH
~9:00 a.m.—second pick-up at Holiday Inn-Nashua, Northeastern Blvd (exit 4) (park in rear lot adjacent to highway—do not wait in hotel lobby)
~10 a.m. to 3 p.m.—time at Museum of Fine Arts on your own. There are 3 restaurants within the museum for lunch. We’ll depart the museum at 3 p.m. and arrive back in NH approx 4 p.m.

Notes:
~Personal, non-commercial photography is permitted without flash or tripods in the permanent collections (not in special exhibits, this includes Avedon)
~Items may be left on the bus for the day such as tote bags, jackets, etc., however, you will not have access to them as the bus must park quite a distance away from the museum
~Please feel free to bring snacks and beverages (no alcohol) aboard the bus


To reserve: email colette@newhampshiretours.com or call 603-880-1420
Please make check payable to Photographers Forum and mail to
Colette Crisp, NH Tours, P.O. Box 3312, Nashua NH 03061
item.how_to_find_us: Meet the group at bus pick-up location that you select when making your reservation.
item.name: Field trip to Museum of Fine Arts- RICHARD AVEDON exhibit
